resources.string: This SIM card was set as the default for %s. Hold and drag down the Status Bar to change the default SIM.
"Data connection failed or network is busy."

"3G service is not available for the selected SIM. This may make data loading slow. You can change the 3G service under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure you want to select this SIM?"
"3G service is not available for the selected SIM. This may make data loading slow. You can change the 3G service under Settings > SIM management. Are you sure you want to select this SIM?"
"You must enable data roaming for this SIM first. This may incur significant roaming charges! Are you sure you want to enable and select data roaming for this SIM?"

"3G service is not available for the selected SIM. This may make data loading slow. You can change the 3G service under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure you want to select this SIM?"
"3G service is not available for the selected SIM. This may make data loading slow. You can change the 3G service under Settings > SIM management. Are you sure you want to select this SIM?"

"You must enable data roaming for this SIM first. This may incur significant roaming charges! Also, 3G service is not available with this SIM. Data loading may be slow. You can change this under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure you want to enable data roaming and select this SIM?"

"You must first enable data roaming for this SIM. This may incur significant roaming charges! However, 3G service is not available with this SIM. This may cause data to load slower. You can change this under Settings > SIM management. Are you sure you want to enable and select data roaming for this SIM?"
%1$s is turned off. Would you like to turn this SIM card on?
Aeroplane mode is on, would you like to turn it off?
Slide down notification list to switch to default SIM card
Adjust backlight automatically to save power

"4G/3G service not available for the selected SIM, data may load slowly. You can change the 4G/3G service setting under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure you want to select this SIM?"

"You must enable data roaming for this SIM. This may incur significant roaming charges! Also, 4G/3G service not available with this SIM and data may load slowly. You can change this in Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure you want to select and enable data roaming for this SIM?"
